algorithm.name: SPHINX
algorithm.description: Detects and transcribes English language speech in audio and video files.

properties.name: FRAME_INTERVAL
properties.description: Controls whether the component performs detection on every frame in the video segment, or skips some frames at a regular interval. Must be greater than or equal to 0. If the frame_interval is set to 0 or 1, a frame_interval of 1 will be used, so that detections are performed on every frame. For a frame interval N > 1, every N-1 frames will be skipped.

properties.name: MERGE_TRACKS
properties.description: In the context of videos, when set to true, attempt to merge tracks spanning segment boundaries.

properties.name: MIN_GAP_BETWEEN_TRACKS
properties.description: In the context of videos, similar tracks with less than this number of frames between them will be merged into a single track. If MERGE_TRACKS is false, this has no effect.

properties.name: MIN_TRACK_LENGTH
properties.description: In the context of videos, defines the minimum track length in frames. Tracks shorter than this minimum length will be silently discarded.

properties.name: EXTRACT_TRACK_DATA_FROM_MEDIA
properties.description: When set to true, track frames will be extracted from images and videos..

properties.name: CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD
properties.description: The minimum confidence score which must be met or exceeded. Detections below this threshold are silently discarded.

actions.name: SPHINX SPEECH DETECTION ACTION
actions.description: Executes the Sphinx speech detection algorithm using the default parameters.

pipelines.name: SPHINX SPEECH DETECTION (WITH MARKUP) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs OpenCV face detection and marks up the results.
